import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{EllaLogoIcon,EllaBrandIcon,ChevronRightIcon,ChevronDownIcon,ShareIcon,SettingsIcon,UserIcon,MoreIcon,ProfileIcon}from'../assets/icons';import{useTheme}from'../context/ThemeContext';import'../styles/Header.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{currentTheme,themes,setTheme}=useTheme();const[isDropdownOpen,setIsDropdownOpen]=useState(false);const dropdownRef=useRef(null);const handleThemeSelect=theme=>{setTheme(theme);setIsDropdownOpen(false);};// Close dropdown when clicking outside
useEffect(()=>{const handleClickOutside=event=>{if(dropdownRef.current&&!dropdownRef.current.contains(event.target)){setIsDropdownOpen(false);}};document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header close-ella-search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header__left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__logo-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EllaLogoIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EllaBrandIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header__workspace-text",children:"Workspace"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChevronRightIcon,{})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header__center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"theme-dropdown",ref:dropdownRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"theme-dropdown__trigger",onClick:()=>setIsDropdownOpen(!isDropdownOpen),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"theme-dropdown__text",children:currentTheme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChevronDownIcon,{})]}),isDropdownOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"theme-dropdown__menu",children:themes.map(theme=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`theme-dropdown__item ${currentTheme===theme?'theme-dropdown__item--selected':''}`,onClick:()=>handleThemeSelect(theme),children:theme},theme))})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header__right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShareIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SettingsIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoreIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileIcon,{})]})})]});};export default Header;
